subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Will the roof-dwellers, ballhawks and bleacher bums keep a historic home run ball hit by Barry Bonds, a disliked opposing player, or keep with Wrigley Field tradition and throw it back?
snippet: Will the roof-dwellers, ballhawks and bleacher bums keep a historic home run ball hit by Barry Bonds, a disliked opposing player, or keep with Wrigley Field tradition and throw it back?
